name: Holiday Green Gelatin Salad
author: Ginger
summary: This salad has been a family favorite for over four generations, requested every Thanksgiving and Christmas. It is smooth and creamy with the crunch of pecans, and light green in color. It has a very unique flavor, and goes very quickly at our home. Any left over crushed pineapple and cottage cheese make a great snack for kids.
ingredients: 1 cup crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-O® mix
directions: In a large measuring pitcher, mix reserved pineapple juice and enough water to yield 2 cups
Pour into a pot and bring to a boil
Add the lime and lemon gelatin mixes and stir until completely dissolved
Stir the mayonnaise and evaporated milk together in a mixing bowl
Stir in the gelatin mixture until completely blended
Mix in the crushed pineapple, cottage cheese, and pecans
Pour the gelatin mixture into a serving bowl
Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight
